trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around September 30th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile out walking one night, I spotted four bright lights within a cloud. The weather was clear, and it was a dark night. The lights resembled the engines of a four-engine aircraft (similar to a C-54) all lined up and I had no idea what they were pointing at. There was no noise at all, and after a while I noticed they began slowly moving toward the southeast, about five miles, then I lost them in the sky. I estimate the cloud containing the lights was about a half-mile wide, the lights never moved in relation to one another, until the entire "thing" (cloud and lights) slowly moved to the southeast and disappeared. I estimate their altitude to be 1000 to 2000 feet, but it is really hard to estimate altitude with no reference points and no idea how big the "thing" was. FYI: I used to be a MUFON invetigator (1980), however this is the first time I have ever seen anything in the sky resembling a UFO.
